title: When you get one of THOSE supports
body: That have as much impact to the game as if they sat at your tower laughing... that don't know when to help you (like when you are getting hunted down) and pretty much die in every encounter with the enemy, gg

replies.body: I did support Darius and Lee Sin in like previous games and it worked fine.
cool, glad to hear about your off meta picks
Have you ever thought that that is exactly what some people will think about you after sharing a game together? It works both ways, you only notice it one way though

This was me one game yesterday.
To be fair, how often do you see 2 yasuo supports, and how often is it that the enemy support is a plat midlaner yasuo :/

Really, this could be renamed to 'when you get one of THOSE players' because this kinda thing can happen in every role, it's just that people tend to notice it more in the duo lane. As someone who played mostly support last season, there were certainly moments where I got one of THOSE ADCs.

Sometimes the ADC isn't meant to be helped while being hunted down, because he's probably doomed anyways if it's {{champion:131}} v {{champion:96}}  while there support is too far away, low on health, OOM, or simply too weak.

If they die in every encounter with the enemy, they're probs helping everyone else so much they don't die.

Laughing under tower leads to diving and that leads to kills


Okay I'm just making this stuff up, but it IS theoretically possible! And I assume you mean as an ADC, because if you were top tank MS Hecarim being chased by Xerath support or something, it wouldn't be worth it at all. On the other extreme, if you're being chased by 5 people, it also wouldn't be worth it at all.

I mean the enemy adc gets an advantage and chases me, he is full health and misses q as taham... then he runs in to try and get 3 stacks on the enemy jinx letting annie get her stun on me and when he realizes the minion wave is killing him he runs away and I die, jinx uses chompers and traps him to get a double...

He leaves me to 1v1 shyvana who has a 2 level and sated devourer lead ( I did kill her but died in the process)

Dies under tower because of bad positioning

I can't even farm because he does not know the basics of presence, annie is harassing me so show some teeth and bite back but no you are going to camp bush until they walk in and kill you

Goes to mid lane after they take dragon, getting 1v3'd by the leaving enemy team and I am 1v1 against a 6/0 jinx.

In every teamfight he dives into the middle of a heavy cc teamcomp spamming his q

Never once used his w to save someone, or even eat their carry

Literal definition of useless

The list goes on, I can provide more info if it pleases you

( was vayne, already weak early game)
